titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress with respect to the need for shareholder democracy in the rules administered and supervised by the Securities and Exchange Commission.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

bill.summary: 2/5/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Securities and Exchange Commission should use its authority to preserve the one share, one vote rule on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) and to modify the rules of other exchanges so that the NYSE will not be placed at a competitive disadvantage.
